core_metadata_found.creator: Robert Huber
core_metadata_found.keywords: Event label, Neogloboquadrina pachyderma sinistral, maximum diameter, Giant box corer, Gravity corer (Kiel type), Multiple investigations, Kasten corer, CTD/Rosette, Scanning electron microscope (SEM), M2/2, M7/3, M7/5, M17/2, M21/4, M21/5, LO09, ARK-II/4, ARK-II/5, ARK-VI/2, ARK-V/2, ARK-VII/1, ARK-VIII/3, SO82, Meteor (1986), Professor Logachev, Polarstern, Sonne, Veränderungen pelagischer Karbonatflüsse seit dem Pliozän: Rekonstruktion polarer und atlantischer Wassermassen im Nordatlantik (PlioKarbonat)
core_metadata_found.summary: This data set contains unpublished measurements of the maximum diameter of shells of the planktic foraminifer Neogloboquadrina pachyderma sin. carried out on surface sediment samples from the Norwegian-Greenland Sea.
core_metadata_found.title: Maximum diameter of Neogloboquadrina pachyderma sinistral from surface sediment samples from the Norwegian-Greenland Sea
